attributes.action: give Adrian Bartle a knighthood for his services to the community
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Adrian Bartle is one of the kindest,friendlist and helpful person we all know he deserves a knighthood for this. come on gorden you know it makes sense.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking honours nominations from the general public. See: http://www.direct.gov.uk/en/Governmentcitizensandrights/UKgovernment/Honoursawardsandmedals/TheUKHonourssystem/index.htm
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
